write-mode.name: remove_channel_permissions
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnChannelPermission CP WHERE CP.user_id = :user_id AND CP.channel_id = :cid AND CP.role_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelPermissionRole WHERE label = :role_label)

write-mode.name: reset_channel_permissions
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnChannelPermission (channel_id, user_id, role_id) VALUES (:cid, :user_id, (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelPermissionRole WHERE label = :role_label))

mode.name: get_all_orgs
mode.query: SELECT id as orgid,name as orgname,:label as entname from web_customer where id != 1

mode.name: has_channel_family_entitlement
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM rhnChannelFamilyPermissions CFP WHERE CFP.channel_family_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnChannelFamily WHERE label = :label) AND (CFP.org_id IS NULL OR CFP.org_id = :org_id)

mode.name: orgs_in_satellite
mode.query: SELECT wc.id, wc.name, (SELECT COUNT(ru.id) FROM rhnuser ru WHERE ru.org_id = wc.id) users, (SELECT COUNT(s.id) FROM rhnServer s WHERE s.org_id = wc.id) systems, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rhnTrustedOrgs t WHERE t.org_id = wc.id) trusts FROM web_customer wc

mode.name: trusted_orgs
mode.query: SELECT wc.id, wc.name, (SELECT COUNT(s.id) FROM rhnSharedChannelView s WHERE 1=1 AND s.org_id = torg.org_id AND s.org_trust_id = torg.org_trust_id) as sharedChannels FROM web_customer wc, rhnTrustedOrgs torg WHERE 1=1 AND torg.org_trust_id = wc.id AND torg.org_id = :org_id

mode.name: trust_overview
mode.query: SELECT org.id, org.name, (SELECT count(*) FROM rhnTrustedOrgs tr WHERE tr.org_trust_id = org.id AND tr.org_id = :org_id) trusted FROM web_customer org WHERE org.id != :org_id

mode.name: get_total_entitlement_counts
mode.query: SELECT sgt.id as id, sgt.label as label, SUM(sg.max_members) as total, SUM(sg.current_members) as used, (SELECT (sg2.max_members) - (sg2.current_members) FROM rhnServerGroup sg2 inner join rhnServerGroupType sgt2 on sg2.group_type = sgt2.id WHERE sg2.org_ID = 1 AND sgt2.label = sgt.label) as available FROM rhnServerGroup sg inner join rhnServerGroupType sgt on sgt.id = sg.group_type WHERE sgt.label != 'sw_mgr_entitled' GROUP BY sgt.label, sgt.id ORDER BY sgt.label

mode.name: get_org_entitlement_counts
mode.query: SELECT wc.name as name, wc.id as orgid, sgt.label, sg.max_members as total, sg.current_members as usage, (SELECT (sg2.max_members) - (sg2.current_members) + sg.max_members FROM rhnServerGroup sg2, rhnServerGroupType sgt2 WHERE 1=1 AND sg2.group_type = sgt2.id AND sg2.org_ID = 1 AND sgt2.label = sgt.label) as upper FROM web_customer wc, rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupType sgt WHERE 1=1 AND sgt.id = sg.group_type AND sgt.label = :label AND sg.max_members != 0 AND wc.id = sg.org_id ORDER BY wc.name

mode.name: get_available_entitlements_for_label
mode.query: SELECT (sg.max_members) - (sg.current_members) as upper FROM rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupType sgt WHERE 1=1 AND sg.group_type = sgt.id AND sg.org_ID = 1 AND sgt.label = :label

mode.name: get_sat_entitlement_usage
mode.query: SELECT SUM(sg.max_members) as total, SUM(sg.current_members) as curr, COUNT(sg.max_members) as alloc FROM rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupType sgt WHERE 1=1 AND sgt.id = sg.group_type AND sgt.label = :label AND sg.max_members > 0 AND sg.org_id != 1

mode.name: get_used_org_counts
mode.query: SELECT COUNT(sg.org_id) as orgsused FROM rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupMembers sgm, rhnServerGroupType sgt WHERE sg.GROUP_TYPE = sgt.id AND sgm.SERVER_GROUP_ID = sg.id AND sgt.label = :label
